hypothesis_content.title: Trump-Themed Memecoin Volatility Surge on Political News
hypothesis_content.statement: The release of major U.S. political news (e.g., poll results, debate headlines, policy announcements) triggers a >300% increase in 1-hour trading volume for the leading Trump-themed memecoin (MAGA/TRUMP), preceding a directional price move of >|20%| within the following 3 hours.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Trump-themed memecoins have demonstrated high sensitivity to political developments. A massive volume spike on news indicates intense, focused attention from a politically-aligned trader base, creating a short-term liquidity and momentum imbalance that is likely to persist.
entry_conditions: Asset: Primary Trump-themed memecoin (highest market cap, e.g., MAGA or TRUMP)
Trigger: 1-hour volume spike >300% vs. 24-hour average, coinciding with a major political news headline (verified by news API sentiment score > |0.5|)
Entry: Market order in the direction of the initial 15-minute price move following the volume spike
hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Volume spikes are predominantly noise (e.g., wash trading) and fail to predict a sustained directional move more than 50% of the time.
